summary: This appears to be an email or internal communication regarding Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his registration number and an updated timeline. The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Epstein was found dead in his jail cell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The email subject line identifies him by name and his registration number (73618-059), indicating he is the primary subject of the document.

events.title: Communication regarding Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his jail cell.
It references Epstein's Bureau of Prisons registration number: 73618-059.
The subject indicates the communication pertains to an 'updated timeline' concerning Epstein.
